analyses.description: Chromatin accessibility profiling using Bowtie/Bowtie2 for alignment and HOMER for peak calling
Transcriptome profiling using FastQC, Trimmomatic, STAR for alignment, and DESeq2 for differential expression
Proteome profiling using MaxQuant with Andromeda search engine, label-free quantification (LFQ), and limma for differential analysis
Differential accessible chromatin regions analysis using HOMER and edgeR
Differential gene expression analysis using DESeq2 (log2FC >0.5, adjusted p <0.05)
Differential protein expression analysis using limma (log2FC >0.5, p <0.05)
Pathway enrichment analysis using fgsea with Hallmark gene sets
Pathway enrichment analysis using Hallmark gene sets based on proteomics data

results.metric: Number of differentially expressed genes (DEGs) with log2FC >0.5 and adjusted p <0.05
Number of differentially expressed proteins with log2FC >0.5 and p <0.05

results.value: TNF-a signaling via NF-kB, hypoxia, p53 signaling, UV response, interferon-a response, fatty acid metabolism, protein secretion, oxidative phosphorylation, complement, inflammatory response, allograft rejection, MYC-V2 target genes
coagulation, interferon-a (IFN-a), interferon-g (IFN-g), oxidative phosphorylation, MYC-V2 target genes, E2F targets, DNA repair pathways
